languages.text: "Славно, славно... надеюсь, кожу снимают с людей в сознании? При случае хочу поприсутствовать и насладиться зрелищем".
"A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skins off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."
languages.original_text: "Славно, славно... надеюсь, кожу снимают с людей в сознании? При случае хочу поприсутствовать и насладиться зрелищем".

traits.locale_text: "A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skin off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."
"A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skin off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."

"A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skins off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."

languages.text: “这确实是个精妙的习俗……剥下那些人的脸的时候，他们应该是清醒的吧？我希望有机会也能亲自参与这样的手术，好好享受这场盛宴。”
languages.original_text: "A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skins off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."

traits.locale_text: “这确实是个精妙的习俗……剥下那些人的脸的时候，他们应该是清醒的吧？我希望有机会也能亲自参与这样的手术，好好享受这场盛宴。”

languages.text: 「実に素晴らしい伝統だな…皮を剥ぐとき、相手には意識があるのだろう？ぜひ一度、その手順を見学して愉しませてもらいたいものだ」
languages.original_text: "A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skins off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."

traits.locale_text: 「実に素晴らしい伝統だな…皮を剥ぐとき、相手には意識があるのだろう？ぜひ一度、その手順を見学して愉しませてもらいたいものだ」

languages.text: «Una costumbre magnífica... Espero que los sujetos estén conscientes cuando les arrancan la piel. Me encantaría presenciar tal procedimiento y disfrutar del espectáculo».
languages.original_text: "A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skins off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."

traits.locale_text: «Una costumbre magnífica... Espero que los sujetos estén conscientes cuando les arrancan la piel. Me encantaría presenciar tal procedimiento y disfrutar del espectáculo».

languages.text: "Gerçekten hoş bir gelenek. Umarım derileri yüzüldüğü sırada insanların bilinci yerinde oluyordur. Ben de bir ara böyle bir işleme katılmayı ve gösterinin tadını çıkarmayı çok isterim."
languages.original_text: "A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skins off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten hoş bir gelenek. Umarım derileri yüzüldüğü sırada insanların bilinci yerinde oluyordur. Ben de bir ara böyle bir işleme katılmayı ve gösterinin tadını çıkarmayı çok isterim."

languages.text: « Une bien belle tradition, en effet... J'espère que les sujets sont conscients lorsque vous les écorchez. J'aimerais pouvoir assister à une telle procédure et profiter du spectacle. »
languages.original_text: "A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skins off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."

traits.locale_text: « Une bien belle tradition, en effet... J'espère que les sujets sont conscients lorsque vous les écorchez. J'aimerais pouvoir assister à une telle procédure et profiter du spectacle. »

languages.text: "Eine nette Tradition, in der Tat. Ich hoffe, die Subjekte sind bei Bewusstsein, wenn Ihr ihnen die Haut abzieht? Ich würde dem Prozedere gerne beiwohnen und die Vorstellung genießen."
languages.original_text: "A fine tradition indeed... I hope the subjects are conscious when you peel their skins off? I would love to attend such a procedure myself sometime and enjoy the show."

traits.locale_text: "Eine nette Tradition, in der Tat. Ich hoffe, die Subjekte sind bei Bewusstsein, wenn Ihr ihnen die Haut abzieht? Ich würde dem Prozedere gerne beiwohnen und die Vorstellung genießen."
